title: What prevents small to medium size businesses from applying more technology to their business, besides cost? - Quora

response.answer_text: The greatest expense in installing and running new a technology system comes from making the required operational changes to the business, so that the business procedures will correspond to the technology. (You might think that the technology should conform to the business operations, but it doesn’t.) The second greatest expense is the added staff (or different staff) needed to operate the new technology, and the the new management skills needed to manage the whole process. Many SMB don’\t want to undertake these changes.
I would guess the major hindrances would be the perceive learning curve, training and integration without disruption, speaking for my own experience.
